item.description:
Let's start the new year off with something intellectual :)

The Museum of Fine Arts has put together a collection of rare Egyptian artifacts, called The Secrets of Tomb 10A. The Egyptian section of the Museum has always been impressive, and this one promises to be especially so.

Furthermore, the Museum is also hosting a collection of exclusive paintings from India, called Bharat Ratna.

But best of all, Jan 02 is the first weekend of the month...........which means that admission is free with your Bank of America card.

Now, surely we can't miss this, can we?
item.name: Museum of Fine Arts
